import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, TrendingUp, Shield, Zap, Clock, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all'); const tabs = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Products' }, { id: 'electric', name: 'Electric Cars' }, { id: 'used', name: 'Used Cars' }, { id: 'luxury', name: 'Luxury Cars' }, { id: 'smartphones', name: 'Smartphones' }, { id: 'laptops', name: 'Laptops' }, { id: 'gaming', name: 'Gaming' } ]; const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Real-Time AI Pricing', desc: 'Prices updated every 5 minutes based on market trends' }, { icon: , title: 'Verified Sellers', desc: 'All sellers are verified with background checks' }, { icon: , title: 'Instant Delivery', desc: 'Fast shipping across the UK with tracking' }, { icon: , title: 'Money Back Guarantee', desc: '30-day return policy on all purchases' } ]; return (
